title: (x) Children's book - Schoolbook Alternate/FF Schulbuch Nord {Franz}
content:
I found this type in a children's book. Can somebody ID this typeface.   
   
thanks, romesh   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221633im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/27101.jpg)
author: nike

comments.content:
not exactly, the "y" and uc "i" are different.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221633im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/27104.jpg)   
   
in deinem profil steht designstudent. bei deinem wissen über schriften ist das doch ein bisschen untertrieben, oder? : ))

You're right, that new sample doesn't match.. It's probably [Schoolbook Alternate](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221633/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/bq_library/90035.html) Bold aka [FF Schulbuch Nord](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221633/http:/www.fontfont.com/shop/view_packages_main.ep?id=20) Fett then.

Oha, ein Landsmann! Naja, Typografie ist schon seit l�ngerem mein Hobby, und Designstudent bin ich nun mal. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221633im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)  
   
Back to english ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221633im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
